data.text:
This hotel has the perfect location. It's situated in the middle of Konak and Alsancak right on the waterfront. We had a room with a sea view and the sunsets were amazing from our balcony. Apart from the perfect location, this hotel is a bit run down and very outdated. Our room was clean, but it's in desperate need of updating. It seems like the hotel was busy working on one of the floors, so hopefully, things will look better soon.

The beds and bedding did not feel like great quality. Something like a mattress topper and better pillows will improve sleep quality a lot. The blanket in the cupboard was also not very soft.

Something to keep in mind with booking a sea view room, the restaurants downstairs are very noisy till late at night. You can hear conversations and cutlery moving. The AC is ancient and had a strange smell when we tried to turn it on, so we opted to sleep with the balcony door open. Luckily we are deep sleepers, otherwise, this would have been a problem with the noise from below.

Font desk staff speak English but were of no help when asked how to get a public transport card or questions on how to get to certain attractions. The Izmirim card for public transport can be purchased at the offices left of the pedestrian bridge as you head to Konak. Nevertheless, the staff was still friendly and helped with our bags.

Breakfast had a good selection of food. Coffee and juice are served in paper cups, which is not great for the price you pay to stay here. It would really not take much to have proper glasses and mugs. The juice was Cappy juice from a bottle - other hotels in Turkey in the same price range serve fresh juice.
data.title: Perfect location, but outdated hotel

data.text:
Very very disappointing experience…

Such a shame to let it run down like this,
with that location and amazing view of the bay and the history behind it, its just such a shame..
Reading the other reviews proved to us the owners don’t care about the service they give anymore .. 

The room we stayed in was smelling damp and had to sleep with a balcony door open,  
Electric plugs were hanging off the wall, mirror in the bathroom came off its hinge,
looked so old and uncared for wherever you looked or touched.

There was not even a complementary bottle of water in the room for the price they are charging, 
On the bed there is only one pillow for  each person,  not even sure if they were clean..

Even if they had a sign in the room saying it is open every day their SeaBar on the roof top was not in use as usual which has an amazing potential to be the best in the city,

And the receptionist looked down with shame and had no answers other then that they would have changed our room but quite sure the other option would be very similar anyway so no point in changing really ..

So all in all it was not a good stay whatsoever..
VERY SURE  WILL NEVER BE GOING BACK TO THIS HOTEL…
data.title: DISAPPOINTING

data.text:
The previous reviews were quite alarming, yet we went ahead with our two night stay just to check it out for ourselves. It was a pleasant stay without any inconveniences. The rooms were very comfortable, clean and had all the amenities that we expected. The view was breathtaking, the sunsets from the room were priceless. Breakfast was very good as well. We were pleased we chose to stay here. 
A proper comforter on the bed would have elevated the room a notch above. No other shortcomings. No bugs, no smells.
data.title: Best location

data.text: The location of the hotel is fantastic in front of the park and the sea at Konak. The staff was polite. The rooms were in general clean but old with obvious signs of moisture. The air-conditioned were at least 20 years old in my room and the carpet very old with all that entails. the price was the same as other hotels in the area. Breakfast was unacceptable for the 4-star hotel.
data.title: Average hotel with great location!!!

data.text: Even though the city of Izmir gave a great impression, unfortunately this hotel ruined the full experience! The personnel was not helpful at all regarding trips, transportation or opening hours and advised us to use google, where everything is not updated online during covid. The hotel room looked ok, but the bathroom was dirty and was spread with remains of some sort of bugs. We made the hotel aware and their solution was to give us another room, exactly 2 floors below the one we had. Fair enough. We went to check it out and fould a dead cockroach on the floor so our only option was to return to our first room. The bed sheets and duvet cover was also dirty and had black stains. We thought maybe it was permanent marks and we removed the sign saying "please dont change my sheets" in hopes of it being changed as a solution. The following day we went on a full day trip, and when we returned we found the exact stains on the bed. We called reception to ask if they changed the sheets daily to which they replied "yes, ofcourse" so we went down to show them the dirty stains. The guy at the reception was very rude and yelled "what can I do about it". No apology, no explanation, no correction that the sheets were not changed daily! He only informed us that we could speak with the manager in the morning and at least they brought us a new duvet cover. Disgusting hotel! Service is non exsistent!
data.title: Worst experience! Hotel with cockroaches.
